::KitKat/ DarkMouse::

KitKat::
She turned and followed Scorponok. "What happened? Why did she leave?"
She had to admit, she was getting a little worried about the mouse 
herself.
~~~~~~~~~~~~

DarkMouse::

She stopped to catch her breath. She decided to sit for a while.  She 
pulled the rat from her shoulder and held him. "How does one little 
rodent like me get into these messes anyway? huh? Do you know my 
little friend?" She held the rat up to her face  and looked at him.  
The rat reached out a paw and touched the end of her nose.  she 
chuckled, "You don't know either huh? Oh well.  I'll get us out of 
this somehow."  She sat there for a while and didn't realize that she 
had drifted off into sleep.
The rat crawled up her arm and back to her shoulder.  It curled up 
against her neck and slept as well.
